segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle that’s spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right in it, but she doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the drain must be clogged, or maybe the plug is stuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, and the wood is going to warp if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a mess, and no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone walks in and fixes this before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s apron is going to be drenched soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she looks while standing in a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR
